Articles.Content:
School started last week, and already my French teacher assigned my class a project. Basically, we had to do one of those poems where you break a word into individual letters and make words out of them (you'll see what I'm getting at). Since 95% of my being is devoted to KSP, I decided it was only just if I include the game into my project. What was planned to be a few little references turned into a massive, full color masterpiece. The clock says it took me four hours to make (started at 9 AM, finished at 1 PM), but it did not feel that long.

How did I do, guys?

P.S. Claude is my French name.

Edited September 7, 2014 by Thomas988
Clarifications?
Good god that is epic man I'm now going to do that with every school project thanks man

Good god that is epic man I'm now going to do that with every school project thanks man

Gotta spread the love!
